subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cincinnati Reds capitalized on Billy Wagner's wildness to dampen José Reyes's first career cycle. Brandon Phillips hit a bases-loaded single on an 0-2 pitch to rally the Reds past the Mets.
snippet: The Cincinnati Reds capitalized on Billy Wagner's wildness to dampen José Reyes's first career cycle. Brandon Phillips hit a bases-loaded single on an 0-2 pitch to rally the Reds past the Mets.
